title: Suggestion
body: Is there ever going to be skin trading?

replies.body:
Not likely.
It would encourage account hacking like on Steam.

I have several really rare skins that can't be obtained anymore, like Silver Kayle, PAX Sivir and PAX Jax.

If you implement a trade system, suddenly my account becomes a target for malicious conduct for people to access my account and trade those skins off to other people.
Really, Pax Jax isn't that like worth $1000?
Well now it has no price because it can't be redeemed anymore.
